arts.ttl: Gittens to pick Arsenal and reject Chelsea, Man Utd: Dortmund star’s big transfer decision
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund’s Jamie Gittens is a wanted man, with the young Englishman coveted by a string of Premier League giants including Arsenal, Chelsea and Manchester United. Jamie Gittens: Why Arsenal are Dortmund star's best option

arts.ttl: Wednesday's Transfer Talk Update: Jonathan David, Lionel Messi, Claudio Echeverri
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Tired BVB Draw 1-1 With Lille in First Leg of Champions League Round of 16
arts.sum: Despite taking an early lead, Borussia Dortmund could not capitalize on home-field advantage in the first leg of their Champions League round of 16 tie, drawing 1-1 with Lille. BVB landed the first blow, with Karim Adeyemi scoring a brilliant volley from the edge of the area halfway through the first half, but beyond that, Dortmund never really got going, failing to register another shot on target after this point.

arts.ttl: Dortmund labour to cagey stalemate with Lille
arts.sum: BVB hosted LOSC Lille this evening in the UEFA Champions League last-16 first-leg which ended in a 1-1 draw.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Borussia Dortmund Face Lille in Champions League Round of 16
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. No abusing of other commentators or match officials.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Borussia Dortmund vs. LOSC Lille
arts.sum: Official team news has just been released for Die Schwarzgelben who face LOSC Lille in the UEFA Champions League's last-16 first-leg.

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Blues suffer blow in chase for Borussia Dortmund attacker?
arts.sum: Chelsea are allegedly dealt a blow in their efforts to secure the signature of a Borussia Dortmund attacker during the summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Champions League top scorer - Did Premie League clubs miss a trick not signing Borussia Dortmund's Serhou Guirassy?
arts.sum: When Serhou Guirassy was the top scorer in the Bundesliga after scoring 14 goals in the first eight games of the season with Stuttgart last term, it felt as though the Guinean was just on a red-hot...

arts.ttl: Jamie Bynoe-Gittens: Chelsea, Liverpool, Arsenal among clubs handed major transfer boost as new asking price is 'revealed'
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund reportedly lower their asking price for in-demand winger Jamie Bynoe-Gittens amid reported interest from the likes of Liverpool, Arsenal and Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Jamie Gittens to Chelsea: Transfer 'EXPECTED' amid €100m 'dream'
arts.sum: Jamie Gittens is expected to leave Borussia Dortmund in the summer and he will not command the €100 million fee the Bundesliga side dream of, according to German media. A change of scenery is needed for Gittens and it has been known for a few weeks now that he will likely leave Dortmund at the end of the season if they miss out on Champions League football.
